original: Jacobowsky, Carl Ulf Vilhelm, fil. dr, landsbibliotekarie, Skara, f. 23/4/96 i Uddevalla av dir. Efraim J. o. Rosa Simkov^sky. G. 39 m. fil. mag. Agda Sandberg. Barn: Carl Olof Ludvig f. 42. — Studiex. i Gbg 15, fil. kand. i Upps. 20, fil. lic. 25, fil. dr 32. Anst. v. red. av Sv. uppsl :bok. 28-30, tf. läns-hibl. i Östersund 30-38, därunder organ. vandr :bibl :verksamh. i Jämtl. 1., bibi. v. stifts- o. landsbibi. i Skara samt ordf. i styr. f. detsamma sed. 38. Skr.: Uddevalla m. omnejd i sv. litt. (17), Böcker om Bohuslän (22), Sy studenter i Oxford c:a 1620-1740 (28). Svenskar i främm. land under gångna tider (30), Andrée (30), J. G. Spar-wenfeld (akad. avh. 32), Litt. om Nya Sv:e (37) m. fl. bibliograf. skr., person- O’, kulturhist. art. i Sv. uppsl bok, tidn. o. tidskr., redig. Jämtil. bibi. årsskr. 32-38.
translated: Jacobowsky, Carl Ulf Vilhelm, PhD, county librarian, Skara, born on April 23rd, 1896 in Uddevalla to director Efraim J. and Rosa Simkovsky. Married in 1939 to Agda Sandberg, who has a degree in philosophy. They have a son named Carl Olof Ludvig, born in 1942. He took his high school degree in Gothenburg in 1915, received a Bachelor of Arts in Uppsala in 1920, a licentiate in philosophy in 1925, and a PhD in philosophy in 1932. He was employed as a managing editor of the Swedish National Encyclopedia from 1928 to 1930, acting county librarian in Östersund from 1930 to 1938, during which he organized the mobile library activities in Jämtland County. Afterwards, he served as a librarian at the Skara diocese and county library and chairman of its board since 1938. He authored several bibliographical and cultural history works on Uddevalla and its surroundings (1917), books on Bohuslän (1922), Oxford students from Sweden around 1620-1740 (1928), Swedes abroad in past times (1930), Andrée (1930), J.G. Sparwenfeld (PhD thesis in 1932), Literature on New Sweden (1937), among others. Additionally, he has written personal, cultural, and historical articles for the Swedish National Encyclopedia, newspapers, journals, and edited the Jämtland County Library's annual journal from 1932 to 1938.
